TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IssuedTokenServiceCredential extends System.Object

summary.span: 允许服务配置与客户端出示的联合凭据相关联的属性。

span.span: Allows a service to configure properties associated with the federated credential presented by the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类使用户可以控制出示给服务的 SAML 令牌如何通过身份验证。This class allows the user to control how SAML tokens presented to the service get authenticated.

value.span: 一个 URI 泛型列表。

span.span: A generic list of URIs.

summary.span: 获取一个枚举值，该值指示是否应验证受众限制条件。

span.span: Gets an enumerated value that indicates whether the audience restriction condition should be validated.

value.span: 一个枚举值，指示是否应验证受众限制条件。

span.span: An enumerated value that indicates whether the audience restriction condition should be validated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的枚举值包括 `Never` 、 `Always` 和 `BearerKeyOnly` 。Enumerated values for the property include `Never`, `Always`, and `BearerKeyOnly`. 默认值为 `Always`。The default value is `Always`.

summary.span: 获取或设置已颁发服务凭据的自定义 。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom for issued service credentials.
The custom for the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类所使用的已颁发令牌为 SAML 令牌。The issued tokens that this class uses are SAML tokens. Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 提供了一个 可以序列化和反序列化大多数 SAML 令牌的默认类。Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) provides a default class that is able to serialize and deserialize the majority of SAML tokens. 如果服务必须处理包含不受默认序列化程序支持的元素的 SAML 令牌，则此属性可用于提供可以处理这些元素的自定义序列化程序。If the service must process SAML tokens that contain elements that are not supported by the default serializer, this property can be used to provide a custom serializer capable of processing these elements. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何设置此属性。The following code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[S_UEIssuedTokenServiceCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueissuedtokenservicecredential/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_UEIssuedTokenServiceCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueissuedtokenservicecredential/vb/module1.vb#1)] 该属性也可以在配置文件中设置。The property can also be set in a configuration file. [!code-xml[S_UEIssuedTokenServiceCredential#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueissuedtokenservicecredential/common/app.config#100)]

span.span: Attempted to set a read-only credential.
